message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000.
